title: Love, American Style
plot: An anthology comedy series featuring a line up of different celebrity guest stars appearing in anywhere from one, two, three, and four short stories or vignettes within an hour about versions of love and romance.
awards: Won 2 Primetime Emmys, 2 wins & 5 nominations total
stars: Stuart Margolin, Barbara Minkus, William Callaway
